projects.title: GameCraft
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered LLM-based system capable of designing and building simple arcade-style games based on user inputs through an interactive GUI | Java, OpenGL, React, Node.js, Python, Google Gemini

projects.title: StarWardle
projects.description: Building a full-stack daily Star Wars character guessing game, featuring real-time attribute-based feedback, dynamic backend APIs and an interactive Star Wars-themed UI | MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js

projects.title: Rover Mine Exploration Simulator
projects.description: A project focused on simulating various rover-server communication methods, featuring random map generation, mine disarming and rover explosions | Python, gRPC, Docker, RabbitMQ, FastAPI, JavaScript, Azure

projects.title: Kidney Fibrosis Image Classifier
projects.description: Collaborated on a project focused on utilizing machine learning techniques to detect the presence and severity of fibrosis in rat kidney images, enabling predicative assessments | Python, TensorFlow, Keras

projects.title: Secure Banking System
projects.description: Built a secure client-server banking system supporting basic banking transactions, with encrypted communication, audit logging and an ATM interface | Python, tkinter

projects.title: Budget Tracker App
projects.description: A budget tracker application that enables users to add, view, and manage their expenses while categorizing them for better financial insights | Django, React, JavaScript

projects.title: Lifes Canvas
projects.description: Designed and developed a responsive website for Life's Canvas to showcase products and offerings | React, JavaScript, CSS, Node.js

projects.title: Pong Game
projects.description: Developed a Ping Pong-style game, controlled by switches on a board, with dynamic signal generation and output displayed on a VGA monitor | VHDL

projects.title: Peer-To-Peer Network
projects.description: A P2P Network where peers can register content, exchange content among themselves and de-register content through the support of an index server | C

projects.title: Bookstore App
projects.description: A book store application that allows customers to purchase books from a catalog and owners to add/remove books and adjust prices | Java, Java FXML

projects.title: Online Movie Store
projects.description: Designed and Developed a Online Movie Database System with a GUI where users can buy, view, sort and review movies | Python, SQL, Bash

projects.title: Art Showcasing Website
projects.description: Developed a personal art portfolio website showcasing my passion for photography, art and design | React, Javascript, CSS, Node.js, React-MDL
